function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlation between air pollution and human illness","Impact":"Increased mortality rates","Mitigation":"Reduce air pollution through stricter regulations and cleaner technologies","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, emission control technologies","People":"General population, especially in densely populated areas","Owner":"Government, environmental regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Extended survival of bioaerosols due to PMs and NO2","Impact":"Increased spread of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Improve air quality through reduced emissions and better urban planning","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, urban green spaces","People":"General population, especially in areas with high levels of air pollution","Owner":"Environmental organizations, city planners"},{"Description":"Higher mortality rates in provinces with worst air pollution","Impact":"Increased risk of death from virus infection","Mitigation":"Improve air quality through emission controls and public health interventions","Technologies":"Public health education, vaccination programs","People":"Population in heavily polluted areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, government"}]}
